1.name: Jaws
1.description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach resort, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

2.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
2.description: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

3.name: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
3.description: In World War II Italy, four fascist libertines round up nine adolescent boys and girls and subject them to one hundred and twenty days of physical, mental and sexual torture.

4.name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
4.description: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

5.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
5.description: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

6.name: Barry Lyndon
6.description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

7.name: Dog Day Afternoon
7.description: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

8.name: Three Days of the Condor
8.description: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

9.name: The Mirror
9.description: A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

10.name: Jeanne Dielman, 23, quai du commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
10.description: A lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet. However, something happens that changes her safe routine.

11.name: The Eiger Sanction
11.description: A classical art professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.

12.name: Picnic at Hanging Rock
12.description: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

13.name: Tommy
13.description: A psychosomatically deaf, dumb and blind boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the object of a religious cult.

14.name: Deep Red
14.description: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

15.name: Shivers
15.description: The residents of a suburban high-rise apartment building are being infected by a strain of parasites that turn them into mindless, sex-crazed fiends out to infect others by the slightest sexual contact.

16.name: The Story of O
16.description: The beautiful O is taken by her boyfriend, Rene, to a bizarre retreat, where she is trained in bondage and sexual perversion. Rene discharges a personal debt by transferring possession of O...                See full summary »

17.name: Rollerball
17.description: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

18.name: The Man Who Would Be King
18.description: Two British former soldiers decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

19.name: Nashville
19.description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention as secrets and lies are surfaced and revealed.

20.name: The Stepford Wives
20.description: Joanna Eberhart has come to the quaint little town of Stepford, Connecticut with her family, but soon discovers there lies a sinister truth in the all too perfect behavior of the female residents.

21.name: Death Race 2000
21.description: In a dystopian future, a cross country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points that are tallied based on each kill's brutality.

22.name: Ilsa: She Wolf of the SS
22.description: Ilsa is an evil Nazi warden at a death camp that conducts "medical experiments". Ilsa's goal is to prove that women can withstand more pain and suffering than men and therefore should be allowed to fight on the front lines.

23.name: The Romantic Englishwoman
23.description: What is real and what is fiction? Faced with writer's block with his novel, Lewis Fielding turns to a movie script about a woman finding herself after his wife Elizabeth returns from Baden ...                See full summary »

24.name: Supervixens
24.description: Clint Ramsey has to leave his job working at Martin Bormann's gas station and flee after his wife is murdered by psycho cop Harry Sledge, who tries to pin the murder on Clint. Crossing ...                See full summary »

25.name: Shampoo
25.description: Lovers undo a hairdresser from Beverly Hills around Election Eve in 1968.

26.name: Royal Flash
26.description: Ne'er-do-well Harry Flashman is coerced by Otto von Bismark into impersonating a Prince.

27.name: A Boy and His Dog
27.description: A young man and his telepathic dog wander a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

28.name: Mandingo
28.description: A slave owner in the 1840s trains one of his slaves to be a bare-knuckle fighter.

29.name: Professione: reporter
29.description: A frustrated war correspondent, unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, takes the risky path of coopting the identity of a dead arms dealer acquaintance.

30.name: The Return of the Pink Panther
30.description: Inspector Clouseau is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

31.name: Coonskin
31.description: Rabbit, a country-born trickster, takes over the organized crime racket in Harlem, facing opposition from the institutionalized racism of the Mafia and corrupt police.

32.name: Rooster Cogburn
32.description: Marshal Rooster Cogburn unwillingly teams up with Eula Goodnight to track down the killers of her father.

33.name: Escape to Witch Mountain
33.description: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

34.name: Take a Hard Ride
34.description: After selling his cattle in town, ranch owner Morgan unexpectedly dies, and his foreman Pike has to deliver the payroll to Sonora, despite the perilous journey during which he's followed by many shady characters who want the money.

35.name: The Beast
35.description: A late businessman's daughter is heading with her aunt to the crumbling estate of her soon-to-be husband, unaware of the strange rumours that cloud the family's name.

36.name: The Killer Elite
36.description: Mike Locke, who works for a private security firm affiliated with the C.I.A., is betrayed by his partner and left apparently crippled for life.

37.name: Night Moves
37.description: Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister .

38.name: Breakout
38.description: A bush pilot is hired for fifty thousand dollars to go to Mexico to free an innocent prisoner.

39.name: Farewell, My Lovely
39.description: Los Angeles private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by paroled convict Moose Malloy to find his girlfriend Velma, former seedy nightclub dancer.

40.name: The Wind and the Lion
40.description: In early twentieth century Morocco, a Sharif kidnaps an American woman and her children, forcing President Theodore Roosevelt to send in forces to conduct a rescue mission.

41.name: Race with the Devil
41.description: Two couples vacationing together in an R.V. from Texas to Colorado are terrorized after they witness a murder during a Satanic ritual.

42.name: Breakheart Pass
42.description: John Deakin is being transported, as a prisoner, on a train with supplies and medicine to Fort Humboldt, Nevada.

43.name: Strip Nude for Your Killer
43.description: When a fashion model dies during an abortion, a series of murders begins, starting with her doctor. The next victims are connected to the modeling agency where she worked, Albatross, run by...                See full summary »

44.name: Let's Do It Again
44.description: Two Atlanta men raise funds for their charity by rigging boxing matches in New Orleans, but their tricks attract the mob's attention.

45.name: Hard Times
45.description: The adventures of a drifter turned illegal prize-fighter during the Depression Era in New Orleans.

46.name: Dersu Uzala
46.description: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

47.name: Smile
47.description: It's time again for California's "Young American Miss" beauty pageant, the biggest event of the year for Big Bob Freelander and Brenda DiCarlo, who give their all to put on a successful ...                See full summary »

48.name: Hababam Sinifi
48.description: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

49.name: Black Moon
49.description: To escape a gender war, a girl flees to a remote farmhouse and becomes part of an extensive family's unusual, perhaps even supernatural, lifestyle.

50.name: Love and Death
50.description: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.
